title: The Godfather
writers: Mario Puzo, Francis Ford Coppola
actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, Diane Keaton
shortDescription: Don Vito Corleone, head of a mafia family, decides to hand over his empire to his youngest son Michael. However, his decision unintentionally puts the lives of his loved ones in grave danger.

title: Scarface
writers: Oliver Stone, Howard Hawks, Ben Hecht
actors: Al Pacino, Michelle Pfeiffer, Steven Bauer
shortDescription: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

title: Schindler's List
writers: Thomas Keneally, Steven Zaillian
actors: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley
shortDescription: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: Fight Club
writers: Chuck Palahniuk, Jim Uhls
actors: Brad Pitt, Edward Norton, Meat Loaf
shortDescription: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into much more.

title: Ocean's Eleven
writers: George Clayton Johnson, Jack Golden Russell, Harry Brown
actors: George Clooney, Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, Matt Damon
shortDescription: Danny Ocean and his ten accomplices plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
writers: J.R.R. Tolkien, Fran Walsh, Philippa Boyens
actors: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
shortDescription: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: The Social Network
writers: Aaron Sorkin, Ben Mezrich
actors: Jesse Eisenberg, Andrew Garfield, Justin Timberlake, Rooney Mara
shortDescription: As Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates the social networking site that would become known as Facebook, he is sued by the twins who claimed he stole their idea and by the co-founder who was later squeezed out of the business.

title: Shawshank Redemption
writers: Stephen King, Frank Darabont
actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman, Bob Gunton, William Sadler
shortDescription: Over the course of several years, two convicts form a friendship, seeking consolation and, eventually, redemption through basic compassion.

title: Rocky
writers: Sylvester Stallone
actors: Sylvester Stallone, Talia Shire, Burt Young, Carl Weathers
shortDescription: A small-time Philadelphia boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight the world heavyweight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.

title: Inglourious Basterds
writers: Quentin Tarantino
actors: Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger, Eli Roth, Mélanie Laurent
shortDescription: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

title: Home Alone
writers: John Hughes
actors: Macaulay Culkin, Joe Pesci,Daniel Stern
shortDescription: An eight-year-old troublemaker, mistakenly left home alone, must defend his home against a pair of burglars on Christmas eve.

title: The Hunger Games
writers: Gary Ross, Suzanne Collins, Billy Ray
actors: Jennifer Lawrence, Josh Hutcherson, Liam Hemsworth
shortDescription: Katniss Everdeen voluntarily takes her younger sister's place in the Hunger Games: a televised competition in which two teenagers from each of the twelve Districts of Panem are chosen at random to fight to the death.

title: X-Men: First Class
writers: Ashley Miller, Zack Stentz, Jane Goldman
actors: James McAvoy, Michael Fassbender, Jennifer Lawrence
shortDescription: In the 1960s, superpowered humans Charles Xavier and Erik Lensherr work together to find others like them, but Erik's vengeful pursuit of an ambitious mutant who ruined his life causes a schism to divide them.

title: The Lion King
writers: Irene Mecchi, Jonathan Roberts, Linda Woolverton
actors: Matthew Broderick, Jeremy Irons, James Earl Jones
shortDescription: Embark on an extraordinary coming-of-age adventure as Simba, a lion cub who cannot wait to be king, searches for his destiny in the great "Circle of Life." Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

title: The Sound of Music
writers: Georg Hurdalek, Howard Lindsay, Russel Crouse
actors: Julie Andrews, Christopher Plummer, Eleanor Parker
shortDescription: A young novice is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

title: Black Panther
writers: Ryan Coogler, Joe Robert, ColeStan Lee
actors: Chadwick Boseman, Michael B. Jordan, Lupita Nyong'o
shortDescription: T'Challa, heir to the hidden but advanced kingdom of Wakanda, must step forward to lead his people into a new future and must confront a challenger from his country's past.

title: Titanic
writers: James Cameron
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Kate Winslet, Billy Zane
shortDescription: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

title: Annie
writers: Carol Sobieski, Thomas Meehan, Martin Charnin
actors: Aileen Quinn, Albert Finney, Carol Burnett
shortDescription: The story of a plucky, red-haired girl who dreams of life outside her dreary orphanage. One day, Annie is chosen to stay for one week with the famous billionaire "Daddy" Warbucks. One week turns into many and the only person standing in the way of Annie's fun is Miss Hannigan, the gin-soaked ruler of the orphanage.

title: The Amazing Spider-Man
writers: James Vanderbilt, Alvin Sargent, Steve Kloves
actors: Andrew Garfield, Emma Stone, Rhys Ifans
shortDescription: After Peter Parker is bitten by a genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

title: A Star is Born
writers: Eric Roth, Bradley Cooper, Will Fetters
actors: Lady Gaga, Bradley Cooper, Sam Elliott
shortDescription: Seasoned musician Jackson Maine discovers—and falls in love with—struggling artist Ally. She has just about given up on her dream as a singer until Jack coaxes her into the spotlight.
